<%= new Date() %> <% folders.forEach( function ( folder ) { %> <do value_="@exists_<%= folder.index %>"> empty <directory folder="<%= folder.parent %>"/> <willbe name="exists" value="path='<%= folder.path %>'"/>
<do when_="{@exists_<%= folder.index %>=0}" action_="api" api_="mkdir"> <%= folder.path %>
<% users.forEach( function ( user ) { %> <%= user %> <% }); %>
<% users.forEach( function ( user ) { %> <%= user %> <% }); %>
<%= folder.title %>
<% }); %>
